column4: slart: I turned off some kind of setting in compiz now I cant move anything...?
idk if there is a reset optoin..
in CCSM , window management,  make sure Move Window is ticked.  Other than that, you can reset by disabling and enabling compiz thru appearance
I have this marked but it wont work for some odd reason..
and what happens when you go System/Prefs/Appearance, effects to None, then enable them again
uh my screen freeze it go's to desktop blank then it goes back to what I was looking at
ok is there anyway to get it to work again?...
I can move my windows now but compiz no longer works
I can move my windows now but compiz no longer works
